headline: Asia Pacific Food Packaging Market Competitive Analysis, Value Chain & Trade Analysis 2025-2034
summary: As highlighted by Towards Packaging research, the global Asia Pacific food packaging market, valued at USD 167.9 billion in 2025, is expected to reach USD 249.52 billion by 2034, registering a CAGR of 4.5% throughout the forecast period. This market growth is driven by rapid urbanization, rising disposable incomes, and an increasing demand for convenience foods. Key segments include flexible packaging, plastic materials, bakery & confectionery applications, and protective packaging functionality
